mapper.sql: id as id , sortId as sortId , year as year , batchId as batchId , batch as batch , batch1 as batch1 , universityCode as universityCode , universityName as universityName , wsPlanNumber as wsPlanNumber , wsEnrollNumber as wsEnrollNumber , wsHighestScore as wsHighestScore , wsLowestScore as wsLowestScore , wsLowestRank as wsLowestRank , wsAverageScore as wsAverageScore , wsAverageRank as wsAverageRank , lgPlanNumber as lgPlanNumber , lgEnrollNumber as lgEnrollNumber , lgHighestScore as lgHighestScore , lgHighestRank as lgHighestRank , lgLowestScore as lgLowestScore , lgLowestRank as lgLowestRank , lgAverageScore as lgAverageScore , lgAverageRank as lgAverageRank , wsHighestRank as wsHighestRank , planNumber as planNumber , enrollNumber as enrollNumber
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_enroll_report ( sortId, year, batchId, batch, batch1, universityCode, universityName, wsPlanNumber, wsEnrollNumber, wsHighestScore, wsLowestScore, wsLowestRank, wsAverageScore, wsAverageRank, lgPlanNumber, lgEnrollNumber, lgHighestScore, lgHighestRank, lgLowestScore, lgLowestRank, lgAverageScore, lgAverageRank, wsHighestRank, planNumber, enrollNumber ) VALUES ( #{sortId}, #{year}, #{batchId}, #{batch}, #{batch1}, #{universityCode}, #{universityName}, #{wsPlanNumber}, #{wsEnrollNumber}, #{wsHighestScore}, #{wsLowestScore}, #{wsLowestRank}, #{wsAverageScore}, #{wsAverageRank}, #{lgPlanNumber}, #{lgEnrollNumber}, #{lgHighestScore}, #{lgHighestRank}, #{lgLowestScore}, #{lgLowestRank}, #{lgAverageScore}, #{lgAverageRank}, #{wsHighestRank}, #{planNumber}, #{enrollNumber} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_enroll_report
sortId = #{sortId},
year = #{year},
batchId = #{batchId},
batch = #{batch},
batch1 = #{batch1},
universityCode = #{universityCode},
universityName = #{universityName},
wsPlanNumber = #{wsPlanNumber},
wsEnrollNumber = #{wsEnrollNumber},
wsHighestScore = #{wsHighestScore},
wsLowestScore = #{wsLowestScore},
wsLowestRank = #{wsLowestRank},
wsAverageScore = #{wsAverageScore},
wsAverageRank = #{wsAverageRank},
lgPlanNumber = #{lgPlanNumber},
lgEnrollNumber = #{lgEnrollNumber},
lgHighestScore = #{lgHighestScore},
lgHighestRank = #{lgHighestRank},
lgLowestScore = #{lgLowestScore},
lgLowestRank = #{lgLowestRank},
lgAverageScore = #{lgAverageScore},
lgAverageRank = #{lgAverageRank},
wsHighestRank = #{wsHighestRank},
planNumber = #{planNumber},
enrollNumber = #{enrollNumber},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_enroll_report
sortId = #{map.sortId},
year = #{map.year},
batchId = #{map.batchId},
batch = #{map.batch},
batch1 = #{map.batch1},
universityCode = #{map.universityCode},
universityName = #{map.universityName},
wsPlanNumber = #{map.wsPlanNumber},
wsEnrollNumber = #{map.wsEnrollNumber},
wsHighestScore = #{map.wsHighestScore},
wsLowestScore = #{map.wsLowestScore},
wsLowestRank = #{map.wsLowestRank},
wsAverageScore = #{map.wsAverageScore},
wsAverageRank = #{map.wsAverageRank},
lgPlanNumber = #{map.lgPlanNumber},
lgEnrollNumber = #{map.lgEnrollNumber},
lgHighestScore = #{map.lgHighestScore},
lgHighestRank = #{map.lgHighestRank},
lgLowestScore = #{map.lgLowestScore},
lgLowestRank = #{map.lgLowestRank},
lgAverageScore = #{map.lgAverageScore},
lgAverageRank = #{map.lgAverageRank},
wsHighestRank = #{map.wsHighestRank},
planNumber = #{map.planNumber},
enrollNumber = #{map.enrollNumber},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_enroll_report ( sortId, year, batchId, batch, batch1, universityCode, universityName, wsPlanNumber, wsEnrollNumber, wsHighestScore, wsLowestScore, wsLowestRank, wsAverageScore, wsAverageRank, lgPlanNumber, lgEnrollNumber, lgHighestScore, lgHighestRank, lgLowestScore, lgLowestRank, lgAverageScore, lgAverageRank, wsHighestRank, planNumber, enrollNumber ) VALUES ( #{map.sortId}, #{map.year}, #{map.batchId}, #{map.batch}, #{map.batch1}, #{map.universityCode}, #{map.universityName}, #{map.wsPlanNumber}, #{map.wsEnrollNumber}, #{map.wsHighestScore}, #{map.wsLowestScore}, #{map.wsLowestRank}, #{map.wsAverageScore}, #{map.wsAverageRank}, #{map.lgPlanNumber}, #{map.lgEnrollNumber}, #{map.lgHighestScore}, #{map.lgHighestRank}, #{map.lgLowestScore}, #{map.lgLowestRank}, #{map.lgAverageScore}, #{map.lgAverageRank}, #{map.wsHighestRank}, #{map.planNumber}, #{map.enrollNumber} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_enroll_report
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND sortId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sortId} , '%')
AND year like CONCAT('%', #{condition.year} , '%')
AND batchId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batchId} , '%')
AND batch like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batch} , '%')
AND batch1 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batch1} , '%')
AND universityCode like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityCode} , '%')
AND universityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityName} , '%')
AND wsPlanNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsPlanNumber} , '%')
AND wsEnrollNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsEnrollNumber} , '%')
AND wsHighestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsHighestScore} , '%')
AND wsLowestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsLowestScore} , '%')
AND wsLowestRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsLowestRank} , '%')
AND wsAverageScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsAverageScore} , '%')
AND wsAverageRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsAverageRank} , '%')
AND lgPlanNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgPlanNumber} , '%')
AND lgEnrollNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgEnrollNumber} , '%')
AND lgHighestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgHighestScore} , '%')
AND lgHighestRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgHighestRank} , '%')
AND lgLowestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgLowestScore} , '%')
AND lgLowestRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgLowestRank} , '%')
AND lgAverageScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgAverageScore} , '%')
AND lgAverageRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lgAverageRank} , '%')
AND wsHighestRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.wsHighestRank} , '%')
AND planNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.planNumber} , '%')
AND enrollNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.enrollNumber} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
